changelog.title: Latest updates
changelog.heat_details: {LINK} is a Twitch extensions allowing viewers to click on your stream. Twitchat makes it dead easy to use it.

highlights.d:
Following menu entries can now be found under the "Connections" section:
  • Youtube
  • GoXLR
  • Voicemod
  • Stream Deck
  • Spotify
  • OBS
  • Heat
  • Websocket

Receive Streamlabs events on Twitchat.

Get notified when receiving a tip, when someone buys merch or when someone subscribes on your Patreon (needs you to link Streamlabs with Patreon on your dashboard).

Auomate action on any Streamlabs event with the dedicated trigger events.

Link Twitchat with Discord to make communication with your mods easier.
  • Let your mods contact you from Discord
  • Contact your mods on Discord from Twitchat
  • Log info about banned users on Discord
  • Save any chat message to Discord
  • Create custom quick actions
  • Send messages on Discord from triggers
  • Create Discord custom /commands from triggers
  • Post a message on Discord when you go live
Display any currently running poll or prediction on your stream thanks to the new dedicated overlays

Twitchat has been my main activity for over a year and a half now without any other source of income. What Twitchat brings me is unfortunately still far from allowing me to possibly make a decent living from it. If you can afford it, a one-time donation or monthly support on Patreon would help me a lot ‚ù§Ô∏è
